items.sentence: I've asked that question many times, but no one has ever given me a satisfactory answer.

I saw many people who had no clothes and I saw many clothes which had no people in them.
It doesn\'t make much sense to me that Tom would be allowed to go, but Mary wouldn\'t be.
Which translation of this book do you think is better, the French one or the English one?
Tom keeps enough money for a taxi fare home tucked in his sock when he goes out drinking.
I shoot the rabbits in my garden with a squirt gun to keep them away from the vegetables.
The police found Tom lying on the floor with a bullet hole in the middle of his forehead.
Tom and Mary were speaking in French, but switched to English when John entered the room.
I had to change clothes because what I was wearing wasn\'t appropriate for the situation.
